description:
11.228 setparams
Force frame parameter for the output video frame.

The setparams filter marks interlace and color range for the
output frames. It does not change the input frame, but only sets the
corresponding property, which affects how the frame is treated by
filters/encoders.
name: setparams

options.description:
Available values are:

‘auto’

Keep the same field property (default).

‘bff’

Mark the frame as bottom-field-first.

‘tff’

Mark the frame as top-field-first.

‘prog’

Mark the frame as progressive.
options.name: field_mode

options.description:
Available values are:

‘auto’

Keep the same color range property (default).

‘unspecified, unknown’

Mark the frame as unspecified color range.

‘limited, tv, mpeg’

Mark the frame as limited range.

‘full, pc, jpeg’

Mark the frame as full range.
options.name: range

options.description:
Set the color primaries. Available values are:

‘auto’

Keep the same color primaries property (default).

‘bt709’
‘unknown’
‘bt470m’
‘bt470bg’
‘smpte170m’
‘smpte240m’
‘film’
‘bt2020’
‘smpte428’
‘smpte431’
‘smpte432’
‘jedec-p22’
options.name: color_primaries

options.description:
Set the color transfer. Available values are:

‘auto’

Keep the same color trc property (default).

‘bt709’
‘unknown’
‘bt470m’
‘bt470bg’
‘smpte170m’
‘smpte240m’
‘linear’
‘log100’
‘log316’
‘iec61966-2-4’
‘bt1361e’
‘iec61966-2-1’
‘bt2020-10’
‘bt2020-12’
‘smpte2084’
‘smpte428’
‘arib-std-b67’
options.name: color_trc

options.description:
Set the colorspace. Available values are:

‘auto’

Keep the same colorspace property (default).

‘gbr’
‘bt709’
‘unknown’
‘fcc’
‘bt470bg’
‘smpte170m’
‘smpte240m’
‘ycgco’
‘bt2020nc’
‘bt2020c’
‘smpte2085’
‘chroma-derived-nc’
‘chroma-derived-c’
‘ictcp’
options.name: colorspace
